participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and expressive, enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run. I listen to folk music. I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others. I'm allergic to bees. My children are a disappointment.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Reflective and determined, always looking to improve her craft.
participant_2.background: I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories. My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning. I collect memories of my best friend from out of town. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. My parents are my heroes.

content.text: Hey there, how's it going?
Hey! It's going pretty well, I'm excited to go to a writer's meetup tonight.
Oh that's fun! What kind of writing do you do?
I'm a writer, I'm working on a novel right now.
Oh, that's awesome! Do you have a publisher yet?
Not yet, I'm still trying to get an agent.
That's tough, I hope you find one soon!
Thanks! Me too!
What's your favorite thing to write about?
I like to write about relationships and family.
Oh, that's cool. I like to write about my experiences.
Oh yeah, what kind of experiences?
Well I like to run long distances, so I write about my runs and the things I see along the way.
That sounds really cool! I'm not very athletic, I'm more of a writer.
Yeah, I'm not much of an artist either. I'm more of a performer.
Really? What kind of performer?
I'm a musician. I play the guitar.
Oh that's awesome! I love music!
Yeah, I love to play music. It's my way of expressing myself.
I can relate to that, I feel the same way about writing.
Yeah, it's a great way to get your feelings out.
Totally
